document_data.name: Halbasho
document_data.mainbody: '''Halbasho the Smart''' was a [[Common oni|common]] [[oni]] inhabiting [[Horseshoe Temple Oasis]] in the [[Quoya Desert]] during the midâ€“14th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Halbasho led a group of wicked oni in seizing control of the Horseshoe Temple around [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Halbasho supervised the other nine oni and enslaved [[goblin]]s as they attempted to convert a temple for the worship of [[Li Pei]], the lord of the underworld.
document_data.Possessions: Halbasho owned a bag of ''[[dust of illusion]]'', a ''[[potion of invisibility]]'', and a magical ''+3 [[battleaxe]]'', and set of ''+2 [[full plate armor]]'' of [[Shou]] make. He made his den in the Lesser Hall of Perfect Understanding, the quarters of the former abbot.
